LanguageData.JRWBrachiosaurus.label: Brachiosaurus
LanguageData.JRWBrachiosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03827-1903 [BRACHIOSAURUS ALTITHORAX] CODENAME: ATLAS >90
A colossal sauropod that towers above all else, their neck reaching up to the heavens. They are powerful creatures that are not to be trifled with, their strength greater than that of many carnivores.
LanguageData.JRWBrachiosaurus.tools.left_foot.label: left foot
LanguageData.JRWBrachiosaurus.tools.right_foot.label: right foot
LanguageData.JRWBrachiosaurus.tools.head.label: head
